 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: PROJECT X's team of top scientific investigators will do anything to find the solution to some of the biggest questions in science. Project X sets out to explore the front lines of science in an offbeat, entertaining, but intellectually challenging manner. A series that demonstrates to the viewer that science is everywhere in our lives... a passport to a hidden and constantly evolving world of knowledge and events.
imdb.title: Project X
plot: PROJECT X's team of top scientific investigators will do anything to find the solution to some of the biggest questions in science. _Project X_ (qv) sets out to explore the front lines of science in an offbeat, entertaining, but intellectually challenging manner. A series that demonstrates to the viewer that science is everywhere in our lives... a passport to a hidden and constantly evolving world of knowledge and events.::Mitch Gabourie
